name: Recycle 2222
description:
Hello

I'm Sébastien the dev of the this little game.

The game is a school project that we made in 2weeks. We were 3 16 years old guys in the making of this game, 2for the design(tiles, sprites, animation...) and 1 for coding.

It is our first game so we are open for critics or anything else just remind that it's our first game.

We had a lot of fun making this game and we will be glad to develop more if you guys like that one. But we will definitely make other games.

After all it was a great experience and we learned a lot. 

We are glad to present to you are game Recycle 2222!

Stefan-Daniel Georgescu, Bram Mollet, Sébastien van Gansbeke.

And btw the win scene is an inside joke from our class so sorry if you find it weird or something else.
